name: UserManagement
description: Contains methods to manage end users, for example, to register their verification methods, verify their identity, or remove their personal information.

clone().name: clone
clone().description: Makes a duplicate copy of the System.UserManagement object.

deregisterverificationmethod(id,auth.ver.name: deregisterVerificationMethod
deregisterverificationmethod(id,auth.ver.signature: public static void deregisterVerificationMethod(Id userId, Auth.VerificationMethod method)
deregisterverificationmethod(id,auth.ver.description: Deregisters an identity verification method. Use this method to let users delete an existing verification method.

formatphonenumber(string,string).name: formatPhoneNumber
formatphonenumber(string,string).signature: global static String formatPhoneNumber(String countryCode, String phoneNumber)
formatphonenumber(string,string).description: Formats a mobile phone number for a user. Call this method to ensure that the phone number is formatted properly before updating a user’s mobile phone number.

initpasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verificati.name: initPasswordlessLogin
initpasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verificati.signature: public static String initPasswordlessLogin(Id userId, Auth.VerificationMethod method)
initpasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verificati.description: Invokes a verification challenge for passwordless login when creating custom (Visualforce) Login and Verify pages for external users.

initregisterverificationmethod(auth.veri.name: initRegisterVerificationMethod
initregisterverificationmethod(auth.veri.description: Invokes a verification challenge for registering identity verification methods with a custom (Visualforce) page. Users can register either their email address or phone number.

initselfregistration(auth.verificationme.name: initSelfRegistration
initselfregistration(auth.verificationme.signature: public static String initSelfRegistration(Auth.VerificationMethod method, User user)
initselfregistration(auth.verificationme.description: Invokes a verification challenge for self-registration when creating a custom (Visualforce) Verify page for community self-registration.

obfuscateuser(id,string).name: obfuscateUser
obfuscateuser(id,string).signature: public static void obfuscateUser(Id userId, String username)
obfuscateuser(id,string).description: Scrambles users’ data on their request when they no longer want their personal data recognized in Salesforce. When you invoke the method for the user, the data becomes anonymous, and you can never recover it. Use this method to set the username to a specific value after it’s scrambled.

obfuscateuser(id).name: obfuscateUser
obfuscateuser(id).description: Scrambles users’ data on their request when they no longer want their personal data recognized in Salesforce. When you invoke the method for the user, the data becomes anonymous, and you can never recover it.

registerverificationmethod(auth.verifica.name: registerVerificationMethod
registerverificationmethod(auth.verifica.signature: public static void registerVerificationMethod(Auth.VerificationMethod method, String startUrl)
registerverificationmethod(auth.verifica.description: Registers an identity verification method. Verification methods can be a time-based one-time password (TOTP), email or text verification code, Salesforce Authenticator, or U2F. End users register their verification methods.

sendasyncemailconfirmation(string,string.name: sendAsyncEmailConfirmation
sendasyncemailconfirmation(string,string.signature: public static Boolean sendAsyncEmailConfirmation(String userId, String emailTemplateId, String networkId, String startUrl)
sendasyncemailconfirmation(string,string.description: Send an email message to a user’s email address for verification. The message contains a verification link (URL) that the user clicks to verify the email address later on. You can send email verifications in bulk.

verifypasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verifica.name: verifyPasswordlessLogin
verifypasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verifica.signature: public static Auth.VerificationResult verifyPasswordlessLogin(Id userId, Auth.VerificationMethod method, String identifier, String code, String startUrl)
verifypasswordlesslogin(id,auth.verifica.description: Completes a verification challenge when creating a custom (Visualforce) Verify page for passwordless login. If the user who is trying to login enters the verification code successfully, the user is logged in.

verifyregisterverificationmethod(string,.name: verifyRegisterVerificationMethod
verifyregisterverificationmethod(string,.signature: public static String verifyRegisterVerificationMethod(String code, Auth.VerificationMethod method)
verifyregisterverificationmethod(string,.description: Completes registering a user’s email address or phone number as a verification method when customizing the identity verification process.

verifyselfregistration(auth.verification.name: verifySelfRegistration
verifyselfregistration(auth.verification.signature: public static Auth.VerificationResult verifySelfRegistration(Auth.VerificationMethod method, String identifier, String code, String startUrl)
verifyselfregistration(auth.verification.description: Completes a verification challenge when creating a custom (Visualforce) Verify page for community self-registration. If the person who is attempting to register enters the verification code successfully, the user is created and logged in.
